item.title: Contribution
item.description: ðŸ’¡ Learn more about semantic versioning and advanced range syntax. Check for outdated packages The npm outdated command will check the registry to see if any (or, specific) installed packages are currently outdated: npm outdated [[<@scope>/]<pkg> ...] Update packages The npm update command will update all the packages listed to the latest version (specified by the tag config), respecting semver:

item.title: Journal des modifications
item.description: Problems updating npm packages Delete the ./node_modules folder, and run again: npm install Problems with cache Delete the temporary directories: npm run clean
